projects.title: Valueimpact.eu
projects.description:
Freelance project. Designed and developed for Valueimpact, a worlwide financial consulting firm.

Page load performance optimised using Web Page Test:

SEO Optimised step by step using tools such as:

  • SEO tester online
  • SEO Site Checkup

projects.title: Umberto Wetzl website
projects.description:
Umberto Wetzl, architect based in Trieste (Italy). Freelance project.
This website is a single page application built with AngularJS, it also provides a custom admin interface that allows to edit the contents, such as text fields, images, adding projects and news. The back-end was built with Spring Framework, Hibernate ORM and mySql database.
features: single page application interface built with AngularJS
custom admin interface + Java Spring back end (no CMS) for editing contents (texts fields, images, projects and news)
